issue.title: [CF 102] Ignore runes gone?
issue.body:
v3.0.1a
-The 'Ignore runes' option for death knights is gone. It was breaking timers for everyone else, and somehow causing other addons to break (CoolLine)

Will this be returning in a fixed form?

At the moment, I do not want to update and lose this option, it has proved so useful since it got added for prompting me to use death and decay on single target fights.


> Posted by CurseForge user warriorjedi | Imported from CurseForge issue #102 | Raw

comments.body:
Just like to add that I have been using TMW for a long time now, and have found it invaluable for optimizing my gameplay and keeping track of procs, buffs and various other stuff useful to making my DPS better! <3

Thanks very much :)


> Posted by CurseForge user warriorjedi

Yeah. It turns out that it wasn't breaking timers. It still was breaking CoolLine, though, which is the most bizarre thing ever. It only breaks it if the option is enabled, though, so I'm not really going to worry about it. Worst case scenario is that people just won't use the option if they use CoolLine.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
